issue.title: [JAVA] Fix ListVector Tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1300](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1300). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
(1) TestListVector.java doesn't include tests for nested lists where the underlying dataVector for a listVector is also a listVector.

(2) The copy test in TestListVector.java only checks the bit vector contents and doesn't check verify the actual contents of list vector

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1300?focusedCommentId=16115005) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 925
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/925>
